Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I have encountered a bug in which all my kerbals become partially unresponsive upon EVA. I have checked the thread at http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75586-Master-Thread-Unresponsive-Kerbals-in-EVA and done the fixes listed there, as well as installed the Stock Bug Fix Modules Add-on. When EVA I can still jump, turn RCS on and off, and turn headlamps on and off, but nothing else. I cannot control the RCS, however if I jump it will wobble back and forth on it's own. Anybody know what to do here?
